Welcome to Buscapè, cocktail bar in the city centre of Modena.
Find your favourite drink amid our selection of more than 40 cocktails, bottled and draught beers, Italian wines, scented teas and hot chocolates.
Moreover, aperitivo from 6pm to 9pm, great music, live gigs and space for graduation/birthday parties with home-made finger food buffet. And yes, we speak English.
  • 6pm / 1am (fri-sat 2am)
  • Closed on Tuesdays
  • 059.4908477
  • Via Scarpa 8/10 Modena
  • Free wi-fi
